      • AbstractHospitalInfo

        public AbstractHospitalInfo()
        Initializes available doctors list to new Array list. Also initializes patients mapped to doctor to new HashMap.

      • AbstractHospitalInfo

        public AbstractHospitalInfo(java.lang.String hospitalName,
                            java.lang.String hospitalAddress)
        Assigns each of the parameter value to the respective attributes. availableDoctorsList is initialized to empty array list and patientsMappedToDoctor is initialized to an empty Hash map
        Parameters:
        hospitalName - Name of the hospital
        hospitalAddress - Address of the hospital
